Title: Relates to 1,4-Dioxane testing
Summary: Requires each public water system that serves less than ten thousand individuals to test drinking water for the presence of 1,4-Dioxane.
LawCode: Add ยง1151-a, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring 1,4-Dioxane testing of public water systems that serve less than 10,000 individuals
